content: cropped summer top knit pattern pinkforme the cropped summer top is a fitted top with a simple cut the top has a short fitted style so it pairs perfectly with summer skirts or high-waisted jeans designed to be slightly cropped but easily customizable to any length quick to make this pattern is perfect for beginners and seasoned knitters the „cropped summer top is worked from the top down first the front straps are knitted with increases for the neckline the front parts are joined and the arm holes are shaped with increases on both sides next the back part is worked in the same way the front is joined with the back and worked in the round the body is knitted in stockinette stitch to the desired length the hem is knitted in 1x1 twisted rib stitch finally stitches are picked up around the neckline and armholes and edges are knitted in 1x1 twisted rib stitch ©pinkforme skill level experienced beginners c d b a measurements a 32 5 35 5 37 5 40 5 43 5 47 52 57 62 cm 12 8 14
